statements: SELECT * FROM training_reports WHERE training_date = '2022-06-01';
SELECT training_name, roi, effectiveness_rating FROM training_reports WHERE roi > 0.5 ORDER BY training_name ASC;
SELECT report_id, training_date FROM training_reports WHERE effectiveness_rating >= 4 ORDER BY training_date DESC;
SELECT training_name, roi FROM training_reports WHERE roi < 0.3;
SELECT training_name, training_date, roi FROM training_reports ORDER BY roi DESC, training_date ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM training_reports WHERE training_name = 'SQL Basics' ORDER BY training_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT training_name, roi FROM training_reports WHERE effectiveness_rating > 4 ORDER BY roi DESC;
SELECT training_name, training_date, roi FROM training_reports WHERE training_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT AVG(roi) AS avg_roi FROM training_reports;
SELECT training_name, COUNT(*) AS total_reports FROM training_reports GROUP BY training_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
SELECT * FROM training_reports;
SELECT report_name, training_date, trainer_name FROM training_reports ORDER BY trainer_name DESC;
SELECT report_name, training_date, training_duration FROM training_reports WHERE training_duration > 2;
SELECT report_name, trainer_name, training_duration FROM training_reports WHERE trainer_name='John Doe';
SELECT report_name, trainer_name, training_date FROM training_reports WHERE training_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY training_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM training_reports WHERE training_duration >= 3 ORDER BY training_date DESC;
SELECT report_name, trainer_name, training_date FROM training_reports WHERE trainer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT report_name, training_date, trainer_name FROM training_reports WHERE training_duration > 5 AND trainer_name LIKE '%Smith%' ORDER BY training_date ASC;
SELECT report_id, roi_percentage, cost_investment, revenue_generated FROM roi_data WHERE cost_investment > 5000 ORDER BY roi_percentage DESC, revenue_generated DESC;
SELECT report_name, training_duration, trainer_name FROM training_reports WHERE training_duration BETWEEN 2 AND 4 ORDER BY trainer_name ASC, report_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM training_participants;
SELECT participant_name, completion_status FROM training_participants WHERE completion_status = TRUE;
SELECT trainer_name, session_date FROM training_sessions ORDER BY session_date DESC;
SELECT training_id, assessment_score FROM training_results WHERE assessment_score > 80;
SELECT participant_name, trainer_name FROM training_participants, training_sessions WHERE training_participants.training_id = training_sessions.training_id;
SELECT participant_id, participant_name, training_id, completion_status FROM training_participants;
SELECT * FROM training_sessions WHERE session_duration > 60;
SELECT participant_name, session_date, session_duration FROM training_participants INNER JOIN training_sessions ON training_participants.training_id = training_sessions.training_id;

SELECT participant_name, assessment_score FROM training_participants INNER JOIN training_results ON training_participants.participant_id = training_results.participant_id WHERE assessment_score >= 80;
SELECT trainer_name, COUNT(training_id) AS session_count FROM training_sessions GROUP BY trainer_name HAVING session_count > 3;
SELECT * FROM training_sessions;
SELECT session_name, training_date FROM training_sessions WHERE session_id = 1;
SELECT session_id, session_name FROM training_sessions ORDER BY training_date DESC;
SELECT trainee_name, trainee_department FROM trainees WHERE trainee_department = 'IT';
SELECT session_id, total_cost FROM training_costs WHERE total_cost > 1000;
SELECT * FROM training_sessions;
SELECT session_name, training_date FROM training_sessions WHERE training_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT session_name, trainee_name, rating FROM training_sessions JOIN training_feedback ON training_sessions.session_id = training_feedback.session_id;
SELECT trainee_name, trainee_department, total_cost FROM trainees JOIN training_costs ON trainees.trainee_id = training_costs.session_id ORDER BY total_cost DESC;
SELECT session_id, session_name, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM training_feedback GROUP BY session_id ORDER BY avg_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM training_sessions;
SELECT session_id, session_date, attendees_count FROM training_sessions WHERE session_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT name, expertise FROM instructors WHERE expertise = 'Programming';
SELECT course_name, duration_hours FROM courses ORDER BY duration_hours DESC;
SELECT * FROM attendees WHERE company = 'ABC Inc.';
SELECT * FROM training_sessions ORDER BY session_date DESC;

SELECT ts.session_id, ts.session_date, i.name AS instructor_name, c.course_name, a.name AS attendee_name FROM training_sessions ts JOIN instructors i ON i.instructor_id = ts.instructor_id JOIN courses c ON c.course_id = ts.course_id JOIN attendees a ON a.attendee_id = (SELECT attendee_id FROM training_feedback WHERE session_id = ts.session_id);

SELECT s.session_id, s.session_date, i.name AS instructor_name, c.course_name, COUNT(tf.feedback_id) AS feedback_count FROM training_sessions s JOIN instructors i ON i.instructor_id = s.instructor_id JOIN courses c ON c.course_id = s.course_id LEFT JOIN training_feedback tf ON s.session_id = tf.session_id GROUP BY s.session_id, i.name, c.course_name ORDER BY feedback_count DESC;
SELECT i.name, COUNT(s.session_id) AS sessions_count FROM instructors i LEFT JOIN training_sessions s ON i.instructor_id = s.instructor_id GROUP BY i.name ORDER BY sessions_count DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT a.name, a.company, AVG(tf.rating) AS avg_rating FROM attendees a JOIN training_feedback tf ON a.attendee_id = tf.attendee_id GROUP BY a.name, a.company ORDER BY avg_rating DESC;
